Sentencas: Heat recovery offers multiple advantages, such as reducing energy consumption, promoting environmental sustainability, and enhancing productivity.
Titulo: Bi-objective optimization and environmental assessment of SOFC-based cogeneration system: performance evaluation with various organic fluids

Sentencas: Consequently, in this study, a bi-evaporator organic flash cycle (BEOFC) is utilized to recover heat from a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and serves as a heat recovery unit.
Titulo: Bi-objective optimization and environmental assessment of SOFC-based cogeneration system: performance evaluation with various organic fluids

Sentencas: The BEOFC is a groundbreaking system that generates cooling and electricity.
Titulo: Bi-objective optimization and environmental assessment of SOFC-based cogeneration system: performance evaluation with various organic fluids

Sentencas: It boasts a dual-evaporator design that cools air at two distinct temperatures.
Titulo: Bi-objective optimization and environmental assessment of SOFC-based cogeneration system: performance evaluation with various organic fluids

Sentencas: Examining various organic fluids for better BEOFC performance entails evaluating their thermodynamic, environmental, and economic aspects.
Titulo: Bi-objective optimization and environmental assessment of SOFC-based cogeneration system: performance evaluation with various organic fluids

Sentencas: Based on the results, R227ea is selected as the optimal working fluid for BEOFC due to its superior performance.
Titulo: Bi-objective optimization and environmental assessment of SOFC-based cogeneration system: performance evaluation with various organic fluids

Sentencas: Subsequently, a parametric study is conducted and a bi-objective optimization of the proposed system is performed, where the objective functions comprise minimizing the total unit cost of products (TUCP) and maximizing the exergy efficiency.
Titulo: Bi-objective optimization and environmental assessment of SOFC-based cogeneration system: performance evaluation with various organic fluids

Sentencas: Optimized performance can be achieved when TSS1= 364.5 K, Teva1= 273.1 K, TSOFC= 897.3 K, and JSOFC= 5004 A/m2.
Titulo: Bi-objective optimization and environmental assessment of SOFC-based cogeneration system: performance evaluation with various organic fluids

Sentencas: At this point, the exergy efficiency and TUCP surge by 2.63%-point and 27.1% compared to the initial state.
Titulo: Bi-objective optimization and environmental assessment of SOFC-based cogeneration system: performance evaluation with various organic fluids

Sentencas: However, there is a rise of 7.26% in CO2 emission rate, 13.15% in sustainability index, and 8.8% in the total exergoeconomic factor when compared to the base case.
Titulo: Bi-objective optimization and environmental assessment of SOFC-based cogeneration system: performance evaluation with various organic fluids
